long_description: The kids' Osprey Zip 25 pack sports legendary Osprey technical design and quality in an everyday pack that bridges the gap between hauling school books and day hikes on the weekend. Osprey Airscape(TM) ridge-molded foam back panel provides excellent ventilation and comfort. Sewn-in, foam-padded harness features fleece lining and an adjustable sternum strap with rescue-whistle buckle. Spacer-mesh hipbelt with ErgoPull(TM) closure provides a secure fit. Panel-loading main compartment features an internal laptop/document sleeve and hydration exit port for a reservoir (sold separately). Front bungee and side compression straps stabilize the load. Mesh side pockets hold water bottles and other often-used items. The Osprey Zip 25 pack features a top zippered pocket for additional storage and organization.
short_description: The kids' Osprey Zip 25 pack sports legendary Osprey technical design and quality in an everyday pack that bridges the gap between hauling school books and day hikes on the weekend.
